summary: The adventures of the Lafayette Escadrille, young Americans who volunteered for the French military before the U.S. entered World War I, and became the country's first fighter pilots.
cast: James Franco|Scott Hazell|Mac McDonald|Philip Winchester|Todd Boyce|Karen Ford|Ruth Bradley|Abdul Salis|Jean-Philippe Écoffey|Tim Pigott-Smith|Tyler Labine|Gail Downey|David Ellison|Jean Reno|Augustin Legrand|Keith McErlean|Martin Henderson|Shaka|Lex Shrapnel|Christopher Snell|Jennifer Decker|Kate Robbins|Christien Anholt|Pip Pickering|Barry McGee|Michael Jibson|Gunnar Winbergh|Ian Rose|Daniel Rigby|Kyle Hensher-Smith|Lauren Downing|Hayley Downing|Adrien Boublil|Jake Canuso|Eric Seror|Martin Alexander Colton|Lasco Atkins|Robert Dearle|David Furlong|Daniel Johnston|Ralf Rueller|Stephen Samson|John R. Walker
title: Flyboys: Héroes del aire
